mapper.select: SELECT * FROM letters l LEFT JOIN users u ON l.writerNo = u.userNo LEFT JOIN rollingPapers r ON l.rollingPaperNo = r.rollingPaperNo WHERE l.rollingPaperNo = #{rollingPaperNo}

SELECT letterNo, l.rollingPaperNo, writerNo, u.userName, content, l.img, font, fontColor, backColor, date_format(l.regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate FROM users u LEFT JOIN letters l ON u.userNo = l.writerNo WHERE letterNo = #{letterNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO letters (rollingPaperNo, writerNo, content, img, orgImg, font, fontColor, backColor) VALUES (#{rollingPaperNo}, #{writerNo}, #{content}, #{img}, #{orgImg}, #{font}, #{fontColor}, #{backColor})
